page.title: 09TRADE AND TRANSPORT
page.content: {Specific Survey:}Local shopping centres usually have a newsagents,post office,grocers,ladies hairdresser and a fish and chip shop.Sometimes goods are delivered direct to your house, such as milk,mail,newspapers,fizzy drinks,ice cream,frozen foods,fruit and vegetables,and video films.For the big shopping trip people go to the Shopping City,a large,indoor centre providing numerous shops and services. Only closed on Sundays, Saturday is the busiest day of the week.National chain stores include Tesco,Gateway, Littlewoods and Woolworths. There are many other smaller shops too besides a market hall (containing small stalls), banks and building societies.The busway,roads,footpaths and cycleways all join the town estates to the Shopping City.
